thread.title: Holiday Sweets and the Math of Exponentials

author: Eugenia Cheng
title: Holiday Sweets and the Math of Exponentials
text:
Every year, I bake dozens of macarons to share with friends over the holidaysâ€”and to eat myself. After my festive baking marathons, I always seem to eat a fixed proportion each day of however many egg-white-and-ground-almond sweets I have left.
We could model the situation by saying that I eat one-fifth of the total remaining stash, rounded... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
